channel.title: How do u create ur 30sec track?
channel.description:
i'd really love to here what your strategies are when makin a track for beat the clock and your only allowd 30 seconds long.. do u just show off the chorus, do u have a build up, shud ther be an intro or an exit or none at all? tell me how you use those 30seconds ðŸ™ƒ thx LaLa
please respond soon.. gotta finish track by today lol ðŸ˜‰

item.title: How do u create ur 30sec track?
item.dc:creator: INDIR3CT
item.description:
If you want to keep your song at a lower BPM, one layout that has worked for me is 8 bar rise, 4 bar drop.

Read full topic
item.source: How do u create ur 30sec track?

item.title: How do u create ur 30sec track?
item.dc:creator: Auxy
item.description:
Donâ€™t worry about the file getting longer than 30 secs because there is a tail or whatever. Just keep the actual track reasonably short.

item.title: How do u create ur 30sec track?
item.dc:creator: Produk
item.description:
Do as short of an intro and outro as possible. If possible, make the intro a buildup to the drop, then have the fade out exit the drop.

Read full topic
item.source: How do u create ur 30sec track?

item.title: How do u create ur 30sec track?
item.dc:creator: NEWNAMES
item.description:
8 bar build, 8 bar drop, (optional: maybe 1 bar outro) all at 128BPM or a faster genre.
Usually I do the same chords in the build as the drop.
See it in action here.

Read full topic
